name: Alice Legends
description:
Collect your favourite Wonderland characters and take on the Queen of Hearts in this gorgeous solitaire-style game!

Defeat the Queen’s minions and win magic pages to rebuild Wonderland in your own image. Fantastic special powers give you the upper-hand as you explore a stunning 3D world, meeting beautifully hand-illustrated characters along the way.

Are you ready to become a legend?

Beautiful and entertaining, this unique game with its fantastic quirky art-style will keep you positively hooked! Download now and see for yourself!
